website_summaries.verdict: A time-saving straightening brush, perfect for those with busy schedules.
pros: Dries and straightens in one application
Minimizes heat damage and promotes healthy looking hair with ionic technology
Can be used to smooth or volumize
Features rotating temperature control with 3 easily adjustable heat settings
Lightweight design travels well and isn't likely to cause fatigue
cons: Handle is somewhat bulky and can be awkward to hold if you have small hands

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to blow dry than regular blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great product made blow drying sooooo much easier. For super curly hair like mine I would suggest that you brush through with a paddle brush, spiral brush or wide tooth comb to get any knots out then blow dry. Using this brush was much easier than a regular blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid S

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this dryer! I have 4c natural hair and this straighten it with no problem and quickly. I'm telling all my friends to buy this! LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: fdjohnson

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this.
customer_reviews.text: I usually have very frizzy puffy hair especially when I blow dry it. This brush/blowdryer leaves it frizzy free and pretty straight! 100/10. It’s a little bigger than I expected it to be but it’s absolutely perfect. You don’t get super hot while using it and it’s not super loud either! I posted it on my Instagram and so many of my followers bought it and have thanked me for showing them this!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Worked fast
customer_reviews.text: I just got done using this for the first time. I have med/long thick but fine hair. It dried my hair quickly and straightened it! I did use smoothing cream after wards because I needed to - didn't come out as pin straight as using a regular straightener but I don't care - it was fuller! Normally, my hair is frizzy and wavy and it's a pain in the neck to dry then straighten! I am gonna LOVE this thing from now on! Instead of taking an hour - this took me about 5 or 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: Get it now.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty thin/fine shoulder length hair and using a blow dryer usually takes about 10 mins, but I’m left with a frizball on my head, this thing works amazing and I’m left with silky hair like I just straightened it!! Some people were saying the item is really heavy and bulky but I didn’t feel that way at all. Definitely recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin V.

customer_reviews.title: but managed to figure out a good way to dry my hair
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to cut down on using my flat iron in an attempt to keep my hair healthier. When I saw the reviews on this product, I just had to try it. I was washing my hair when UPS dropped off this item. I towel dried my hair and went to work. I was a little uncoordinated at first, but managed to figure out a good way to dry my hair. When finished, I was amazed! My hair was straight and silky. I really did not expect such good results. It looked better than when I flat iron it. If I have any problems, I will update this review. But, for now, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CuzIns

customer_reviews.title: Works Better than I Expected it Would!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about this product before deciding I wanted it but I was still pleasantly surprised by how well it worked once I tried it myself. I can dry my hair in 8 or 9 minutes and it looks good. I touch up my hair with an In-Styler for the finishing touches and it looks like my hair was done at a salon. I can't recommend this product highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jaworski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for lazy beauty girls like me
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This thing is amazing! I am not a beauty tools girl. I can barely pull myself together each day. I have long hair so it takes me 15 minutes to dry it all each morning. I do not like using a brush while I do it, so it ends up looking frizzy. If you're like me, you'll love this. I just brush it through my hair slowly, including face down against my scalp, and it dries it all effortlessly. My hair looks so much nicer now. I don't think I'll ever go back to a regular blow drier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: It saved me a lot of time... took about 15 mins to do half of my hair and it was completely dry. I still will have to flat iron but considering how curly my hair is it got it pretty straight.. I would definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanic

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I have curly, frizzy dry hair. Blow drying with a regular hair dryer makes my hair look I put my finger in a light socket. Now the Lescolton hair dryer dries my hair into a beautiful, silky smooth style in about ten minutes. I had my closest friends over for New Years Eve. They all thought I got a blowout and were astonished when I told them it was just this hair dryer and NO flat iron! I’m in love! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Chodash

customer_reviews.title: Just got it but it’s great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have very naturally wavy hair that dries frizzy and I have to straighten it. I used this for the first time today and my hair is mostly straight and I loved using the dryer! It worked quickly and felt less damaging to my hair. I’ll update my review over time because I’ve only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: C L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but I knew I had to after using this for a couple of weeks. I use it everyday. I have replaced it with my Revlon one step dryer and I love the Lescolton so much more. The air flows out of the entire brush, it heats up very quickly and the air becomes very hot which eliminates my drying time. It only takes me 10 minutes to dry and straighten my hair with this. My hair feels so much more healthy and soft. It’s smooth, straight, and flowy. I absolutely love this tool, I plan on buying more to have for when I travel. Love it! Every woman needs this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I hate doing my hair. I shower in the morning and have to blow dry then straighten. This did both and it looks like my hair was ran through a straightener. I hate doing my hair and I like using this. For reference, my hair is long, fine, and I have a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the same hair dryer for the past 10 years and boy, did I miss out big time. I have very thick hair and it always takes me at least 15+ mins to completely dry my hair; however, this dryer cuts the drying time in half, if not more. On top of that, it also saves me time as my hair comes out perfectly straight after use and I no longer need to use the flat iron. The size of this dryer is bigger than I expected but it actually weighs lighter than it looks.
customer_reviews.author: En

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!! Greatest thing ever. So lightweight and easy to use. I have really long, thick, wavy hair. With this I can style my hair in under 15 mins whereas a normal blow dry and flat iron takes over an hour! Highly recommend! Great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only downside is if your hair is tangly
customer_reviews.text: Can dry my thick hair in 10 minutes. Works great. Only downside is if your hair is tangly, it doesn’t work as well cause the brush isn’t as hard as a normal hair brush. So make sure your hair is really brushed through before you use this. But overall it dried my hair super fast compared to a normal hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: It makes my hair look beautiful and voluminous
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this styler for a couple of months now. I haven't touched my hair straighter or my regular hair dryer since I bought this styler. It has also cut down the drying time by 30%. It makes my hair look beautiful and voluminous!
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine straight hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin straight long hair and this thing is great! It dries my hair quicker than my regular hair dryer and I don't even need to finish the ends with a flat iron or curling iron they look pretty good just with the use of this dryer brush alone.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dryer. My hair is extremely kinky and this dried my hair quickly and without needing too much manipulation. I also love how lightweight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Keys

customer_reviews.title: As good as they say
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that the reviews were true, and they are. If you want to make your hair really smooth with a quick blow out, this is the tool for you. If you use a round brush to give some curl, I don't think this would work for you. But, again, easy to use, quick dry, makes my hair really smooth, and works awesome with a volumizer (since you can hit right at the root) .
customer_reviews.author: Jenny in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this product so far. I’ve only had it a couple weeks so not sure about longevity, but everything else is great. I though three settings wouldn’t be enough but the low fan heat option is great. My hair dries evenly, is super shiny, has a lot of body. It doesn’t really even need to be further heat styled. I don’t wash very often and have fine, thin, straight hair and i think my styles have lasted longer without retouching.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great style... too large to comfortably handle
customer_reviews.text: Pro - It works well. Con - hand hurts holding the dryer. I have shoulder length thin fine hair and although it is straight, I still have used a straightener on it. A friend said she loooooved hers. She has short thin fine hair so she doesn't have to hold it as long. I gave it to my mother in law who has extremely think course curly hair which she straightens daily. She loved the way it work, but her hands are smaller and she has arthritis so again, the handle was too large and the brush to awkward to handle well. 5 stars for ability to work 2 stars for design. = 3 overall.
customer_reviews.author: K. Droptini

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one use
customer_reviews.text: I have has this hair dryer for almost 2 months. I have used it once. I have curly hair and I thought this would be a great and fast way to dry my hair with little heat. It worked great the first time I even recommended this to my friends. However the next time I used it The dryer no longer has hot air only cool so I did not get to use it the second time. This is super disappointing since I don't use the dryer regularly I am just out of the money I spent
customer_reviews.author: Proofofpurchased

customer_reviews.title: If you have long straight hair with texture...
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine product and dries the hair as advertised. I was hoping it would give sleeker, shinier results than a hair dryer, but my hair is left kind of straw-y and frizzy looking. No soft ends, no gentle wave. Just straight dry straw. Part of that is just my hair, but I can manipulate a hair dryer and brush to get that soft silky shine and gentle curl on the ends. Was trying to eliminate two products in exchange for one. If I hadn't thrown away the box, I would have returned it. Instead, I'll give it to my teenager. It will serve its purpose better for her since she just needs dry hair and less purposeful styling.
customer_reviews.author: Caysea

customer_reviews.title: Motor COMPLETELY blew up after just ONE year of use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Motor completely blew up after just 1 year of use. I purchased this dryer in 08/2018. Now it's a little over a year and the motor completely blew up. I started smelling something burning and the noise was less than when it worked. The size and weight are good, but the longevity is horrible. I guess if you don't mind spending 30 dollars every year repeatedly, then it's OK.....
customer_reviews.author: YSP

customer_reviews.title: I love this- I’m not giving it 5 stars though
customer_reviews.text: I love this- I’m not giving it 5 stars though, only because it’s huge and kind of awkward to use. But it’s very effective and my hair looks great. One thing about the size, though- I think the larger surface area of the paddle is helpful in drying my hair faster... so even though it’s huge, the large size is helpful in getting the job done faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Total junk.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. This thing produced a burning smell from the beginning, but after multiple uses it hasn’t let up. And now the brush is melting. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PrncsSara

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only blew out hot/warm air for one week. Now only blows cold air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, long, wavy to curly hair and i usually dried my hair and then used flat iron, now i ony use this this brush but for better effect i first roll my hair into towel and leave it for about 20 minutes then when hair is dump i use the brush hairdryer and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than other brush dryers from Amazon! Keeping It :)
customer_reviews.text: I had tried this brush at a friend's house in New York to avoid going out in the cold with wet hair... It dried my wavy/curly thick hair so fast! I tried another brush dryer that had great reviews on Amazon and several attachments, but it just didn't have the power this one did. I returned the other, received this, and not returning it! I recommend letting your hair air dry for a bit while doing other parts of your routine, like skin care and makeup, then it's much faster than when it's fresh out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Rae

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have long, heavy hair. This hot air paddle brush has really come to the rescue of my difficult to manage hair. It makes it possible to style my hair as if I had a third hand. I don't find it too heavy. It's been a godsend for me. Now my hair is silky in about a third of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to style and dry my hair as it grew into a short hairstyle following chemo. I had always had straight hair and didn’t know what to do with my now curly hair. I also have difficulty with the brush and blow dryer routine. This dryer brush is the best!!! Although it is pretty bulky, it is easy to control, dries my hair quickly and straightens it out. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Before I had this product I would dry my hair with a brush, then run a straightening iron or brush through my hair. This dryer is a one step way to get straighter hair instantly. I have to admit that my hair is long and straight to begin with, with just a little wave so not sure how it would work for someone with curly hair. However, this has been my go to since it arrived, and even went to Europe with me (used a converter) - I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Millicent J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed right now, must learn not to anticipate too greatly. The brush part is very well designed and what I need for my thick hair. The cool and the high temperatures settings put out the same temp and air flow. Doesn't dry hair after towel drying. Or even finish drying after using my regular dryer to get hair 3/4 dry. I'd give this a 0 except the design of the brush is so good. Maybe I got a defective one?
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loved this until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Was totally in love with this until it suddenly stopped blowing hot air a couple of days ago. It only blows lukewarm air and doesn't dry fast any longer. It left my hair straight and smooth before. Another con - it's a little ergonomically awkward, but I still really like it. Lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It does dry my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair so it tends to stand up around my head - it's chin length. It's also quite curly/wavy but those curls flatten out wherever they feel like - leaving me with a strange mess on my head. I thought this dryer would help by straightening without curling as in a round brush. The brush on this dryer is too wide for the length of my hair and it makes static electricity. So YOU picture that. Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Total Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: But it! Do not hesitate to get this amazing brush drier. It’s light weight not loud at all. And the way it dries your hair I had the reckon one before but this drier it gives you like a flat iron effect. It’s amazing the drying power amazing and it does not frizz your hair. It look shiny and sleek total dream. This is my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Vanina

customer_reviews.title: Changed the game!
customer_reviews.text: Buy. This. NOW. Completely changed my hair routine! I have SUPER thick hair. Used to take me AT LEAST an hour and a half to blow dry and straighten my hair. Now, with this product, my styling time is cut in half if not less! No straightener used in this photo! Amazing. Completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Really good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: So far this dryer had closed 'mom's salon hair drying services' and is allowing my daughters to be able to dry their own natural African American hair. One of the girls had a real puff ball and this dryer still dries the hair very well and in good time and hairs is soft when done. It does not stretch or straighten as well so a flat iron is still needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I’ll never use a regular hair dryer again! So easy to use, and it’s kind of relaxing just brushing my hair while it dries. No more holding a hair dryer in one hand and a brush in the other! This thing is WORTH IT! And i have long, thick hair!
customer_reviews.author: Melliebeanie

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Dryer Purchased, 2nd Dryer Broken
customer_reviews.text: I liked the drying power of this dryer which is why when my 1st one broke, I purchased a 2nd one. I haven't had the 2nd one 60 days yet and it is not cracked as well. It is beyond the return time frame, so now I have shop for another blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old granddaughter and she was so excited to get it. The first time she used it. It made her hair so straight and soft that her mom wanted to use it and it made her hair look so good, she received so many compliments on it. It was a great gift and it was priced very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Loveee it
customer_reviews.text: Omg I have wavy medium hair and omg this dried my hair in 5 minutes on high, didn't have to divide my hair in parts or anything just brushed and it is super straight I love love love it, I will be buying a few as gifts ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: if there was less than a star i would give it to this product
customer_reviews.text: well used it for 1 ( one ) ( une ) ( uno ) minute and it got broken , it's really bad
customer_reviews.author: Reem nasser ayedh

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer/Straightener
customer_reviews.text: This product saves me so much time getting ready! I go from wet hair to dry straight hair faster than it used to take with just drying my hair. Because I like my hair super straight I run a flat iron through it in the back. This takes no time and much better than drying hair and then having to straighten all over. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Schneider

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it, it was supposed to be a valentines gift but she couldn’t wait. Her hair gets knotted and the straighter she has takes a while to straighten it and it left her hair looking great and dry easily 👍🏽 Definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Revlon dryer stylist. It blows hot air through the entire head of the brush. Revlon’s just blows it at the top portion of brush. I no longer have to flat iron my hair for silky smooth straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Surf Nurse

customer_reviews.title: I need more...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife as a gift (she has long red hair and it takes her forever to get it dry). She loved it. Her cousin started "borrowing" it and so I got her one. She loves it. I'm bald, so I have no opinion, but they use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE - VERY DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and it was a very loved item in our home until it CAUGHT ON FIRE! We only used it for a few months. VERY DANGEROUS! I wish there was a way customer service would contact us or is there anyone else we can inform so that no one gets hurt from this!
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Family

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer. Drys my hair quick. I have straight hair but if I do not dry it with a brush dryer it just does it own thing. Only problem is I wish it was a little smaller so it would handle better for me. I think this would be great for someone with thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of my favorite things that I've ever bought. It used to take me so long to dry my hair and now it takes me about 15 minutes to go from Wet to straight. It makes blow drying so simple and so easy. The appliance is super lightweight with hot and cool settings. I wish I could give this thing more than five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The reviewer who said this dries/straightens her hair faster and better than her old hair dryer/flat iron combo is either being paid or on something. This product took TWICE as long to dry my hair and didn't straighten my natural waves half as good as using my traditional hair dryer with a round brush. Returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for people who hate blow drying their hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used to hate blow drying my hair but this makes it so much easier. I have naturally wavy/frizzy hair and can blow out in about 10 minutes (depending on how damp my hair is). Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this. It doesn’t take a super long time to get my hair dry and my hair isn’t frizzy after using it! The only thing that bothers me a bit is there’s a part of the handle that gets very very hot if you use it for to long. Otherwise it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kieva22

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this only has 4 stars, but this hair dryer is AMAZING!! I have insanely frizzy and curly hair that takes me at least 60 minutes to blow dry and straighten.... with this dryer my hair is dry is LESS THAN 5 MINUTES and then maybe another 5 minutes to straighten it to smooth it out! It’s a miracle and I no longer dread washing my hair. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot for Me
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it. The brush design would certainly be easier to use than my blow dryer with comb attachment. My problem, is that it gets very hot, and I never use high heat on my hair to prevent damage. If only there was another setting between medium and high.
customer_reviews.author: priss2121

customer_reviews.title: Comb through your hair first
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have thick, coarse Indian hair. It does the trick. I use Argan oil to prep since my hair is naturally dry. I didn't feel the need to touch up with a flat iron either. What a great bonus! It's quiet too. My son doesn't complain about the noise. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to reduce time in the morning styling your hair. Thanks Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachana

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AND ALMOST ELECTROCUTED ME :)
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 4months and today it stopped working... almost electrocuted me and burnt my hair! And can’t return anymore I’m not sure if there’s warranty since you know I threw away the box :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have had it over a year. I have fairly thick hair that takes forever to dry and gets wavy to frizzy depending on the weather. This hot air brush dries it fast without frying it, plus you don't need to style when you're done. I wish there was one with a smaller brush head though. I cut my hair and this is a bit too big now. If there was a version with a smaller brush head I would buy that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg See

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Dries my hair fast and it’s easy to use. The wand gets a little hot at the top but cools down easily. I have a ton of hair and this is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s fine for ppl with healthy straight hair. Mine in color treated and wavy. I prefer a round brush, it smooths out better.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: 😍Money well spent🥰
customer_reviews.text: Used it on both my daughter's curly an 4c hair it work great on both of them I cant wait for wash day so I can use it
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! I have four girls with different textures of hair along with my natural hair we’ve all used it and it works wonders! And dry very fast
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Austin

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke into pieces. The brush part, the pink circle around it and the white part of the head. I liked it while it worked, but now I can’t even use it. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I asked my mom “where was this all my life” this this is life in a heat brush it dries your hair really good and fast and knocks the kinks out I really recommend this , I have right cooked hair and this really got my hair dry and it wasn’t really nappy afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Charnice

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Works well. I have thick hair and it definitely helps dry my hair quicker. Not very heavy but a little bulky. Hard to use to get a good style (other than straight). But I am pretty boring with my hair styles, so it gets the job done. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, not great at straightening
customer_reviews.text: I love this as a hair blow dryer but fault it for not having a great final look. It gives my hair good volume when done but not the shinny, smooth look of a normal straightener. Leaves my hair frizzy and wiry, but much less so than a normal hair blow dryer. I love it to dry my hair, it's easier and much nicer than a normal dryer but not awesome as a 2 in 1 straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lifford

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I have long but not terribly thick
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I have long but not terribly thick, color treated hair. I saw a reduce in the frizz in the first use. It also majorly cut back on my routine since I dont have to separate my hair into 4 bundles and I didn't cramp my arm trying to get the back of my head. I would highly recommend for anyone who is tired of conventional blow drying. It is also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Drier
customer_reviews.text: Previously I used a Conair hairdryer with a brush attachment. I broke two of the Conair's in a 2-year span as they easily clog with hair and it blows the motor. The Lescolton dryer on the other hand, doesn't clog and dries my hair faster than any previous dryer. I definitely recommend it. Best part is, it dries my hair straight!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: bulky and hard to hold. The power button is in the wrong place so I kept turning it off accidentally
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It does an amazing job. Couldn’t be happier with it, have zero complaints. Takes 5 minutes to completely straighten my hair and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have naturally curly hair, and it ususally takes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair, and it ususally takes me at least 20 minutes to straighten my hair with a typical hair dryer and round brush. I used this while getting ready this morning, and my hair was dry in 8 minutes. And straight! I was shocked.
customer_reviews.author: bicoastalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works ok on thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this daily for about 3 months. I like it, but I have pretty thin, straight hair. It does a good job on my hair, but I don’t think it would do well on curly hair. It’s pretty big and the handle is a little awkward to hold.
customer_reviews.author: M. Basker

customer_reviews.title: Not really a straightener but gives a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it doesn’t really straighten my hair like a flat iron. It does give it a smooth finish. The brush is not very sturdy, I have to use a real brush with it in between using. But al in all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It isn’t a small dryer but very easy to use. When I pulled it out of the box all I had to do was plug it in. It has 4 settings and the comb makes it effortless to blow dry your hair. I have natural hair that is very thick when it’s in its natural state. I found the product easier to use when my hair wasn’t soaking wet but damp
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER....I'm natural and don't do a lot to my hair, but occasionally I like to blow it out and would use the threading technique....but this dryer has cut my drying time down to minutes instead of days...I will be buying another one as back up..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my younger daughter because she is very tender headed so doesn’t like styling her hair. With this she allows me to straighten her hair and I use this daily on my waist long hair which it cuts the drying time in half and even completely straightens my hair so I don’t need to bother with the straightener if I don’t want to.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been over a year since I bought this item and I still consider it one of the best purchases I’ve ever made. It’s so easy and fast to use and gives my hair great volume and softness while drying it with ease and helping with frizziness.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Fort

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Dries may hair nicely and straight. Anti frizz. I like that I have one hand free to do other things while drying hair.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very proficient product!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick naturally curly hair that when I decide to straighten it and dry it with a standard blow dryer turns into a major puff ball. While the dryer didn't eliminate the need for my flat iron, it certainly cut down on time it takes to straighten it by over half. Took me only 15 minutes to dry my hair and it normally takes half an hour or longer. Kudos to a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Martell

customer_reviews.title: Works well on natural hair
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well on my 4c hair it is kinda huge but no issues
customer_reviews.author: Shamika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 6months maximum lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Item purchased in November 2019, doesn’t work anymore (May 2020). It’s only being used on the weekends. The same one my gf bought before broke in a few months as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. I bought this product based on the good ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I bought this product based on the good reviews it has. It dries the hair quicker than a blow dryer. Hair turns out straight and not frizzy. It does not look like stick-straight flat ironed hair. It has a good volume to it and some shine. If you try to twist the brush to curve the ends of the hair, it works as well! Overall, this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this for medium-length hair, unless you want your hair to flip up at the ends. The brush is too bulky to allow you to do anything other than pulling your hair down the contour of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Lana A.

customer_reviews.title: styling hair
customer_reviews.text: i'm older and hands get tired with dryin and stylin my short hair. Light and easy to handle with heat, stylin in one. Very surprised and please how this works 2 n 1 hair care.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is a magical gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I literally never leave a review but this hair dryer brush is so amazing!!! My hair is usually so poofy when I blow dry and I can never just blow dry and go. I have to follow up with heat tools. I was completely amazed how frizz free my hair was and couldn't stop touching my hair all day long! It is seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter who has trouble using a regular hair dryer and brush. It is very easy for her to use. The bristles are flexible like a Wet Brush, so it's good on tangles. I've used it and like it, but it does take a little longer than a more powerful dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Bouvy

customer_reviews.title: Save your time to style your hair
customer_reviews.text: Has not too much power to it, blow very slow; otherwise use your skills to blow and style your hair with it, it will definitely save you time !
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S

customer_reviews.title: Hairdryer and brush
customer_reviews.text: Dries hair quickly and reduces frizz and hair is soft and smooth. I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. However, it made my hair too dry although I had used heat protector; also my hair didn't look smooth and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Rahina Mahtab

customer_reviews.title: this was easy to use and achieved the straight hair style that ...
customer_reviews.text: For a novice hair dryer user, this was easy to use and achieved the straight hair style that I desired (my hair is long, very thick with a little wave). Was larger then expected.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!!!! My hair is dry in 5 min and looks flat ironed! Best money I have ever spent on a hair tool!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my daughter and she LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter and she LOVES it. She is a tween and is starting to really put effort into her hair and the blow dryer she had wasn't cutting it. She is a big fan and is thankful that she has this.
customer_reviews.author: P.Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the few weeks it worked..
customer_reviews.text: I hope Lescolton see this review.. Please contact me or let me know how to contact you. I absolutely LOVE this tool, however, after less than 3 weeks of use (not even daily use) it seems to have shorted out or something. :-( It was great while it worked. Should I just send it back via Amazon for a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: MelissaG

customer_reviews.title: Mary
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Easy to use. Bought a second one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Hair stays straight!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this twice so far but I love it! My hair is naturally wavy and when I straighten it it always ends up poofy and frizzy and blah. The first time I used this dryer I liked it - it worked well but I wasn’t quite used to it yet. By the second time - LOVE! I was out all day in the hot humidity and my hair stayed perfect all day. Recommend a thousand times!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bowersox

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to use...
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product. After only using this once, I decided that this was not worth keeping. The handle got really hot when it was used on the high setting.I had to use an oven mitt just to hold. It is also bulky and heavy to hold. I gave it a three because it dried my daughter's hair nicely, but it was difficult operating it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Blow Dryer EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I can dry my hair in less than 10 minutes with this dryer. It gets my hair so straight and soft. I recommend this blow dryer to anyone with thick hair because it really works fast and dries your hair thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya Mills-Stines

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I had a friend who raved about it and I have frizzy hair but it just left my hair poofy. it's also pretty big and awkward to handle. Just get a round brush and your blowdryer- same thing.
customer_reviews.author: STEPH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle with one arm!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I have been looking for! I can't use my left hand very well so this solved the problem as I can blow dry and smooth my thick hair with one hand since the brush is pretty light weight. No more frizz!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jondro

product_meta.title: Lescolton One Step Hair Dryer & Styler Hot Air Paddle Brush | Hair Dryer Straightener For All Hair Types | Eliminate Frizzing, Tangled Hair & Knots, Promote Healthy & Shiny Hair Locks
